flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
将骨头像回力镖一样扔出去，
击落天敌秃鹰娜来复仇。

骨を　ブーメランのように　投げつけ
天敵だった　バルジーナを
撃ち落とし　復しゅう　するのだ。

This Pokémon is out for vengeance on its natural
enemy, Mandibuzz. It throws bones like
boomerangs to try to take it down.

Scaglia il suo osso come un boomerang per
abbattere i Mandibuzz, suoi antichi predatori,
e vendicarsi.

Utiliza su hueso como si fuese un bumerán para
derribar a Mandibuzz, su enemigo natural, a
modo de venganza.

Es wirft seinen Knochen bumeranggleich nach
Grypheldis, dem Erzfeind seiner Vorstufe, um es
vom Himmel zu holen und sich an ihm zu rächen.

Il lance le grand os comme un boomerang pour
abattre son ancien prédateur, les Vaututrice,
pour se venger.

將骨頭像回力鏢一樣扔出去，
擊落天敵禿鷹娜來復仇。

뼈다귀를 부메랑처럼 내던져서
천적이었던 버랜지나를
떨어뜨려 복수한다.

ホネを　ブーメランのように　なげつけ
てんてきだった　バルジーナを
うちおとし　ふくしゅう　するのだ。

母親に　会えない　悲し を　乗り越えた
カラカラが　たくましく　進化した　姿。
鍛えられた　心は　簡単に　くじけない。

Marowak is the evolved form of a Cubone that has overcome
its sadness at the loss of its mother and grown tough. This
Pokémon’s tempered and hardened spirit is not easily broken.

Marowak si evolve da Cubone dopo aver superato il lutto
per la perdita della madre ed essersi fatto forte. Questo
Pokémon dall’animo forgiato e temprato non si fa prendere
facilmente dallo sconforto.

Marowak es la forma evolucionada de Cubone. Es más fuerte
porque ha superado la pena por la pérdida de su madre.
El ánimo de este Pokémon, ya curtido y fortalecido, no es
muy fácil de alterar.

Knogga ist eine entwickelte Form von Tragosso, die den
Verlust der Mutter überwunden hat und stärker geworden ist.
Die gestählte, abgehärtete Seele dieses Pokémon ist nur
schwer zu brechen.

Ossatueur est la forme évoluée d’Osselait. Il a surmonté
le chagrin causé par la perte de sa maman et s’est endurci.
Le tempérament décidé et entier de ce Pokémon le rend
très difficile à amadouer.

어미를 만날 수 없는 슬픔을 극복한
탕구리가 늠름하게 진화한 모습이다.
단련된 마음은 간단히 꺾이지 않는다.

ははおやに　あえない　かなし を　のりこえた
カラカラが　たくましく　しんかした　すがた。
きたえられた　こころは　かんたんに　くじけない。

母親に　会えない　悲し を　乗り越えた
カラカラが　たくましく　進化した　姿。
鍛えられた　心は　簡単に　くじけない。

Marowak is the evolved form of a Cubone that has overcome
its sadness at the loss of its mother and grown tough.
This Pokémon’s tempered and hardened spirit is not
easily broken.

Marowak si evolve da Cubone dopo aver superato il lutto
per la perdita della madre ed essersi fatto forte. Questo
Pokémon dall’animo forgiato e temprato non si fa prendere
facilmente dallo sconforto.

Marowak es la forma evolucionada de Cubone. Es más fuerte
porque ha superado la pena por la pérdida de su madre.
El ánimo de este Pokémon, ya curtido y fortalecido, no es
muy fácil de alterar.

Knogga ist eine entwickelte Form von Tragosso, die den
Verlust der Mutter überwunden hat und stärker geworden ist.
Die gestählte, abgehärtete Seele dieses Pokémon ist nur
schwer zu brechen.

Ossatueur est la forme évoluée d’Osselait. Il a surmonté
le chagrin causé par la perte de sa maman et s’est endurci.
Le tempérament décidé et entier de ce Pokémon le rend
très difficile à amadouer.

어미를 만날 수 없는 슬픔을 극복한
탕구리가 늠름하게 진화한 모습이다.
단련된 마음은 간단히 꺾이지 않는다.

ははおやに　あえない　かなし を　のりこえた
カラカラが　たくましく　しんかした　すがた。
きたえられた　こころは　かんたんに　くじけない。

骨は　大事な　武器である。
ブーメランのように　投げて
獲物に　ぶつけ　気絶させる。

The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the
bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

L’osso che impugna è la sua arma. Lo scaglia come
un boomerang per mettere KO i suoi avversari.

El hueso que lleva es su gran arma. Lo lanza
hábilmente como un bumerán y deja a todos fuera
de combate.

Der Knochen, den dieses Pokémon hält, ist seine
Primärwaffe. Es wirft ihn wie einen Bumerang.

L’os qu’il tient dans la main est son arme la plus
efficace. Il s’en sert comme d’un boomerang pour
assommer sa proie.

뼈는 중요한 무기이다.
부메랑처럼 던져서
사냥감을 맞춰 기절시킨다.

ほねは　だいじな　ぶき　である。
ブーメランの　ように　なげて
えものに　ぶつけ　きぜつ　させる。

体も　小さく　もともと　弱かった。
骨を　使うようになり
性格が　凶暴化した。

It is small and was originally very weak.
Its temperament turned ferocious when it began
using bones.

Di piccole dimensioni, un tempo era del tutto innocuo.
È diventato più aggressivo brandendo un osso
come arma.

Es pequeño y siempre ha sido muy débil. Cuando
empezó a usar huesos, se volvió más violento.

Es ist klein und war ursprünglich sehr schwach.
Erst als es anfing Knochen einzusetzen, wurde es wild.

Ce petit Pokémon était à l’origine très faible. Il est
devenu redoutable le jour où il a appris à se servir
de ses os.

몸집도 작으며 원래는
약했다. 뼈를 쓰기 시작하면서
성격이 흉포해졌다.

からだも　ちいさく　もともと
よわかった。ホネを　つかうようになり
せいかくが　きょうぼうか　した。

From its birth, this savage Pokémon
constantly holds bones. It is
skilled in using them as weapons.

From its birth, this savage Pokémon
constantly holds bones. It is
skilled in using them as weapons.

From its birth, this savage Pokémon
constantly holds bones. It is
skilled in using them as weapons.

Ce Pokémon sauvage possède des os
depuis sa naissance. Il s’en sert
pour combattre avec dextérité.

From its birth, this savage Pokémon
constantly holds bones. It is
skilled in using them as weapons.

Ce Pokémon sauvage possède des os
depuis sa naissance. Il s’en sert
pour combattre avec dextérité.

It collects bones from an unknown place.
Some whisper that a MAROWAK graveyard
exists somewhere in the world.

It has been seen pounding boulders
with the bone it carries in order
to tap out messages to others.

From its birth, this savage Pokémon
constantly holds bones. It is
skilled in using them as weapons.

From its birth, this savage Pokémon
constantly holds bones. It is
skilled in using them as weapons.

From its birth, this savage Pokémon
constantly holds bones. It is
skilled in using them as weapons.

The bone it holds is its key weapon.
It throws the bone skillfully like a
boomerang to KO targets.

It is small and was originally very weak.
Its temperament turned ferocious when it
began using bones.

A MAROWAK is the evolved form of a CUBONE
that has grown tough by overcoming the
grief of losing its mother. Its tempered
and hardened spirit is not easily broken.

MAROWAK is the evolved form of a CUBONE
that has overcome its sadness at the
loss of its mother and grown tough. This POKéMON’s tempered and hardened
spirit is not easily broken.

MAROWAK is the evolved form of a CUBONE
that has overcome its sadness at the
loss of its mother and grown tough. This POKéMON’s tempered and hardened
spirit is not easily broken.

Somewhere in the
world is a ceme­
tery just for MAROWAK. It gets
its bones from
those graves.

It collects bones
from an unknown
place. A MAROWAK graveyard exists
somewhere in the
world, rumors say.

It has been seen
pounding boulders
with the bone it carries in order
to tap out mes­
sages to others.

Small and weak,
this POKéMON is
adept with its bone club. It has
grown more vicious
over the ages.

The bone it holds
is its key weapon.
It throws the bone skillfully
like a boomerang
to KO targets.

It throws the bone skillfully
